original_title: Rocketman: The Luckiest Man on Earth
overview: Rocket Man, the luckiest man on earth... or is he? When the BDU-33 bomb fell from the F-16 fighter plane on Thursday, March 13, 2008, it made U.S. history being the first military bomb to accidentally fall on a residential home. For Jeremy Isbell, resident of Tulsa, Oklahoma and the occupant of this destroyed dwelling, this was only a single incident in a long string of bizarre occurrences in his extraordinary life. Be prepared to hear the tale of an outlandish bombing on an innocent and unfortunate citizen.
tagline: This documentary is based on actual events.
title: Rocketman: The Luckiest Man on Earth
